Package com.example.cshare.ui.views.productlists

Classes related to product list views.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProductDialogFragment.ProductDialogListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CartFragment  
    HomeFragment
    Fragment inheriting from the ProductListFragment class that displays the list of products available on the user's campus.
    ProductDialogFragment  
    ProductListFragment
    Abstract ProductListFragment class, inheriting from the BaseFragment class, within which the global logic for recycler view is implemented
    SharedFragment  

Package com.example.cshare.ui.views.productlists Description

Classes related to product list views.

Contain ui classes as well as the classes needed to configure the product list recycler view in particular with a specific adapter and view holder

Since:
1.0
Author:
Clara Gros, Babacar Toure
